REGISTER.SUBTITLE: Welcome to Ventidole! Your account has been successfully created.

RESET_PASSWORD.TITLE: Password Reset Complete!
RESET_PASSWORD.SUBTITLE: Your password has been successfully reset. You can now log in with your new password.

EULA.TITLE: End User License Agreement
EULA.INTRO: This End User License Agreement ("Agreement") is a legal contract between you ("User") and Ventidole Inc. ("Licensor"), governing your use of the Ventidole fan-idol platform ("Application"). By creating an account or using the Application, you agree to these terms. If you do not agree, please discontinue use immediately.

LICENSE_GRANT.TITLE: 1. LICENSE GRANT
LICENSE_GRANT.DESCRIPTION: Under this Agreement, the Licensor grants you a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable, and revocable license to use the Application for personal, non-commercial purposes. You may not copy, modify, or redistribute any part of the Application without permission.

ACCOUNT.TITLE: 2. ACCOUNT REGISTRATION & TERMINATION
ACCOUNT.DESCRIPTION: You must provide accurate information when creating an account. The Licensor reserves the right to suspend or terminate accounts for violations of these terms or harmful behavior. You may terminate your account at any time through application settings.

USER_CONTENT.TITLE: 3. USER-GENERATED CONTENT
USER_CONTENT.DESCRIPTION:
The Application allows users to create and share posts, comments, images, and other content.

3.1. Content Ownership

You retain ownership of your content but grant Ventidole a non-exclusive, worldwide, royalty-free license to use, display, and distribute content within the platform.

3.2. Prohibited Content

We do not tolerate:

    • Harassment, hate speech, or discrimination
    • Pornographic, violent, or provocative content
    • Fraud, impersonation, or misleading information
Violations may result in immediate suspension or content removal.

MEMBERSHIP.TITLE: 4. MEMBERSHIP OPTIONS & SUBSCRIPTIONS
MEMBERSHIP.DESCRIPTION: Ventidole offers optional memberships and digital purchases such as event tickets, tokens, and idol merchandise. Prices and benefits are displayed in the app. All payments are securely processed via third-party providers. Memberships renew automatically unless canceled before the renewal date.

COMMUNITY.TITLE: 5. COMMUNITY INTERACTIONS & BLOCKING
COMMUNITY.DESCRIPTION: You may follow idols, comment, and message other fans. You can block abusive users. Blocked users will no longer be able to contact you or view your profile.

PRIVACY.TITLE: 6. PRIVACY & DATA USAGE
PRIVACY.DESCRIPTION: Your privacy is important to us. Please review our Privacy Policy for details on how personal data is collected and processed. We never sell personal data to third parties.

CODE_OF_CONDUCT.TITLE: 7. CODE OF CONDUCT
CODE_OF_CONDUCT.DESCRIPTION:
You agree to:

    • Treat other users with respect
    • Avoid offensive behavior or spam
    • Respect intellectual property rights of idols and creators
Repeated violations may result in suspension or permanent bans.

DIGITAL_ITEMS.TITLE: 8. DIGITAL ITEMS & TOKENS
DIGITAL_ITEMS.DESCRIPTION: Some features may include digital collectibles, tokens, or NFT-based assets. Ownership of these assets is governed by public blockchain records. Users are responsible for wallet security and understanding digital transaction risks.

LIABILITY.TITLE: 9. LIMITATION OF LIABILITY
LIABILITY.DESCRIPTION: Ventidole and its affiliates are not liable for indirect or consequential damages, including loss of data or virtual goods, arising from your use of the Application. The Application is provided "AS IS" without warranties of uninterrupted or error-free service.

ELIGIBILITY.TITLE: 10. ELIGIBILITY
ELIGIBILITY.DESCRIPTION: You must be at least 16 years old to use the Application. Some regions may require parental consent for minors. Idol or creator accounts must comply with all local laws and verification procedures.

GOVERNING_LAW.TITLE: 11. GOVERNING LAW
GOVERNING_LAW.DESCRIPTION: This Agreement is governed by the laws of the State of Delaware, United States, without regard to conflict of law principles. Disputes shall be resolved through binding arbitration unless prohibited by local law.

THIRD_PARTY.TITLE: 12. THIRD-PARTY SERVICES
THIRD_PARTY.DESCRIPTION: The Application may integrate third-party services (e.g., Google, Apple, payment gateways). You agree to comply with their respective terms. Ventidole is not responsible for any external service failures.

UPDATES.TITLE: 13. UPDATES & MODIFICATIONS
UPDATES.DESCRIPTION: Ventidole may update these terms periodically. Continued use of the Application after changes take effect constitutes acceptance of the revised Agreement.

CONTACT.TITLE: 14. CONTACT INFORMATION
CONTACT.DESCRIPTION: If you have any questions regarding this Agreement, please contact us at support@ventidole.app.

ACCEPTANCE.TITLE: ACCEPTANCE
ACCEPTANCE.DESCRIPTION: By clicking "Agree" or continuing to use the Application, you confirm that you have read, understood, and accepted this Agreement, including community guidelines, content restrictions, and digital item policies.

VALIDATION.PASSWORD_MIN_LENGTH: Password must be at least 8 characters
VALIDATION.PASSWORD_UPPERCASE: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
VALIDATION.PASSWORD_LOWERCASE: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
VALIDATION.PASSWORD_NUMBER: Password must contain at least one number
VALIDATION.MESSAGE_MIN_LENGTH: Message must be at least 10 characters
VALIDATION.USERNAME_MIN_LENGTH: Username must be at least 3 characters
